welcome.title: Welcome to Café Houben
welcome.description: Since 1890, our family business has been the address for Limburgian hospitality. Whether you come for an overnight stay in our hotel, a delicious dinner in our restaurant, a cozy evening in our café, or a special occasion in our event spaces – you are always welcome.

services.subtitle: Four generations of hospitality under one roof

tradition.description: For more than 130 years, our hospitality has been passed down from generation to generation.

cuisine.title: Limburgian Cuisine
cuisine.description: Authentic dishes prepared with fresh, local ingredients and love for the craft.

service.title: Personal Attention
service.description: With us, you're not just a number. We ensure a warm welcome and personal service.

cta.title: Experience Limburgian
cta.description: We look forward to welcoming you. Contact us for reservations, questions or to learn more about our services.

hotel.heroDescription: Relax in our comfortable rooms and enjoy Limburgian hospitality

intro.title: A Home Away From Home
intro.description1: Our hotel offers you the perfect base to explore the beautiful surroundings of Leudal. After a day full of activities or business, you can relax in one of our comfortable rooms.
intro.description2: All rooms are equipped with modern amenities and furnished with attention to detail. In the morning, you'll be treated to an extensive breakfast prepared with fresh, local products.

cta.title: Interested in a Stay?
cta.description: Contact us for availability and rates. We're happy to help you plan your stay.

restaurant.heroDescription: Taste the authentic flavors of Limburg in an atmospheric ambiance

intro.title: Limburgian Cuisine Prepared with Passion
intro.description1: In our restaurant, we serve honest, tasty dishes prepared with fresh, local ingredients. Our kitchen combines traditional Limburgian recipes with a modern touch.
intro.description2: Whether you come for an extensive lunch, a romantic dinner, or a festive meal - our chef and his team guarantee a culinary experience to remember.

seasonal.title: Seasonal Dishes
seasonal.description: Our menu changes with the seasons, so you can always enjoy the freshest ingredients.

local.title: Local Products
local.description: We work with local farmers and suppliers for the best quality.

desserts.title: Homemade Desserts
desserts.description: End your meal with one of our delicious homemade desserts.

cta.title: Reserve Your Table
cta.description: We recommend making a reservation in advance, so we can guarantee you the best seat.

cafe.heroDescription: The heart of Nunhem - for a snack, a drink, or just good company

intro.title: True Limburgian Coziness
intro.description1: Our café is the place where villagers and visitors come together. For a cup of coffee, a refreshing beer, or a tasty snack - everyone is welcome.
intro.description2: We have carefully preserved the authentic atmosphere of yesteryear. At the bar or at a cozy table - here you immediately feel at home.

cta.title: See You Soon at Our Café!
cta.description: Feel free to drop by for a pleasant moment. For groups, we recommend calling ahead.

history.title: A Family Tradition of More Than 130 Years
history.description1: Since 1890, Café Houben has been the heart of Nunhem. What started as a simple village café with a grocery store has grown into a versatile hospitality business where hospitality is central.
history.description2: For four generations, our family has opened its doors to guests from near and far. We try to pass on the warmth and personal character that our great-grandparents radiated every day.
history.description3: Today, we offer you a complete package: from a comfortable hotel room to a delicious dinner, from a cozy drink in our café to the perfect location for your party or meeting.

hospitality.title: Hospitality
hospitality.description: With us, you feel at home. We welcome every guest with a warm smile and personal attention.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: From fresh ingredients to a perfectly made bed - we strive for excellence in everything we do.

tradition.title: Tradition
tradition.description: With respect for the past, we build for the future. Our recipes and customs are passed down from generation to generation.

location.title: In the Heart of Leudal
location.description: Located on Kerkstraat in picturesque Nunhem, surrounded by the beautiful nature of Leudal.

scooterRental.heroDescription: Explore the beautiful Leudal and surroundings on a comfortable scooter

intro.title: Discover Limburg on Two Wheels
intro.description1: Leudal and its surroundings offer beautiful routes through forests, past castles, and through picturesque villages. On a scooter, you experience all this in a relaxed and enjoyable way.
intro.description2: Our scooters are easy to operate and suitable for anyone with a B driver's license. We provide a short instruction and you can set off immediately!

features.duration: Full day and half day rental available

cta.title: Reserve Your Scooter
cta.description: Contact us for availability and rates. We recommend booking in advance, especially during high season.

intro.description: From intimate gatherings to large parties, from business meetings to emotional moments - our diverse spaces offer the perfect setting for every event.

weddingPage.heroSubtitle: Make your wedding day an unforgettable moment
weddingPage.title: Your Dream Wedding Starts Here
weddingPage.description1: Your wedding day is one of the most important days of your life. We ensure everything is perfect, so you and your guests can enjoy this special day carefree.
weddingPage.description2: From an intimate ceremony to a grand celebration - we have the experience and facilities to make your wishes come true. Together we'll create a program that suits you.

features.partyHall: Party hall for the evening party
features.accommodation: Overnight stay for the bride and groom

funeralPage.heroSubtitle: A dignified place for farewell and remembrance
funeralPage.title: Remembering Together in a Warm Environment
funeralPage.description1: Saying goodbye to a loved one is an emotional moment. We offer a peaceful environment where family and friends can come together to remember and share memories.
funeralPage.description2: Our experienced staff ensure a dignified reception with respect and discretion. You can fully focus on being together with your loved ones.

coffee.title: Coffee & Tea
coffee.description: Unlimited coffee, tea and soft drinks

funeralPage.closingText: We understand this is a difficult time. Please feel free to contact us to discuss the possibilities. We're happy to think along with you.

gardenPage.heroSubtitle: An oasis of tranquility for your special moments
gardenPage.title: A Green Oasis in the Heart of Nunhem
gardenPage.description1: Our beautiful inner garden offers a unique setting for your event. Surrounded by greenery and sheltered from the wind, this is the perfect location for a summer reception, drinks or dinner.
gardenPage.description2: The garden can be used both during the day and in the evening, with atmospheric lighting after dark. Ideal for both formal and informal occasions.

partyHallPage.heroSubtitle: The ideal space for your party or celebration
partyHallPage.title: Space for Larger Celebrations
partyHallPage.description1: Our party hall is the perfect location for birthdays, anniversaries, communions and other festive occasions. The hall offers space for larger groups.
partyHallPage.description2: We take care of everything for you: from atmospheric decoration to delicious catering. You don't have to worry about anything and can fully enjoy your party.

meetingRoomPage.heroSubtitle: An inspiring environment for your business meeting
meetingRoomPage.title: Meeting in a Unique Setting
meetingRoomPage.description1: Are you looking for an inspiring location for your meeting, training or workshop? Our meeting room offers all the facilities you need, in a peaceful environment.
meetingRoomPage.description2: Far from the daily office environment, your participants can fully focus. Of course, we provide catering, from coffee and tea to a complete lunch.
